alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:33AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Trumbull County through 515 AM EDT... At 433 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bristolville, or 10 miles north of Warren, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cortland, Kinsman, North Bloomfield, West Farmington, Bristolville, Vienna Center, Mecca, Johnston, Orangeville, Yankee Lake, Brookfield Center and West Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
